text: Khloe Kardashian is the proud mama of a baby girl, True Thompson. But, as the saying goes : there's a thorn for every rose. And even as she basks in the delights of motherhood, the Keeping Up with the Kardashians sister is facing some romantic woes... and Hollywood Medium's Tyler Henry totally saw it coming. In an episode of the E! show that was filmed months ago, Kardashian sat down with her go - to psychic, who kept mentioning her next beau. ` ` You keep saying my'next boyfriend,'''Khloe noted. ` ` Do you not see anything about my current boyfriend?''
